article: Daming is Lingling's brother. They talk  _  us about their school days. In their class, there  _  about 30 students.  _  have classes from Monday to  _  morning. They don't have  _  on Friday afternoon. Lessons start  _  nine o'clock and finish at five o'clock  _  the afternoon. After school, they go to the  playground  and play basketball. Then they  go home  and have dinner. They watch TV  _  their parents before they go to bed. They are happy every day.
